summary: I present to you, Tyler Carter, ladies and gentlemen! :D I decided to make him and place him in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun!
descriptionHtml:
Tyler Carter~! From the band Issues, or from the band he was previously in Woe, Is Me. Being a HUGE fan of Tyler Carter really made me want to make him a follower after I already made a Savegame of him. I hope you all enjoy him as much as I do~! :D This is my first follower mod that i'm publishing on the Nexus, so be easy on me people. I'm just doing the best I can. He's in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun! He is a mage, almost an exact copy of Onmund.

Mods Needed:
The Eyes Of Beauty by LogRaam - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?
Rayban-like Sunglasses by Bedendo - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33787/?
Apachii Sky Hair by Apachii - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
I HIGHLY Recommend UFO by fLokii - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?
I ALSO HIGHLY Recommend Follower Commentary Overhaul by Terzaerian -http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?

Installation:
Copy sneTylerCarter.esp and sneTylerCarter.bsa into your Skyrim/Data folder.

Removal/Deinstallation:
Just delete sneTylerCarter.esp and sneTylerCarter.bsa from your Skyrim/Data folder.
author: Jonathon Lucas
